name: Spirals
description:
Spirals is a game about drawing spirals of different shapes, sizes and colors.

Left-click to draw a temporary line. Right-click to fix your current temporary line to the drawing surface.

Move your cursor to change the centre of the spiral.

Press [Tab] to see all the different components of the spiral. Press the corresponding hotkey to highlight that component. Then use the mousewheel to alter the component. EASY!!!

Alternatively press [O] to randomize all the components.

A save function is promoted in the menu, yet it doesn't work. Strange.
